Issue.creator: altharp
Issue.summary: The chaincode log level cannot be changed
Issue.description: Chaincode logs become large since the debug level of logging is enabled. When attempting to change the chaincode log level by updating the logging.chaincode parameter in the core.yaml file to warning, no difference in logging is observed and there are still debug level log entries. There is not a way to control the content of chaincode logs by either environment variables or the core.yaml file.
